Name: Cards of Binokee
About the game: Cards of Binokee is an online trading card game with the aim of collecting the different cards to be able to assemble a powerful deck of cards. With this deck of cards, you can then compete against different opponents. With each completed game you collect orbs (in-game currency), which you can use to expand your card collection. Play alone... Play with your deck of cards against the computer in various game modes to train, gain experience and expand your card collection through the orbs you earn. ...or play against your friends In the online multiplayer mode you have the option either against your friends or to prove your skills against randomly selected players. Here too earn new orbs with every game you complete. Collect more than 1000 cards Over 1000 different cards with different strengths can be collected throughout the game. This also includes rare cards and cards with various elements. Open chests to collect cards With the orbs you earn, you can always buy new chests to expand your card collection. There are different chests to choose from which ones each containing five new trading cards. Depending on the selected chest can also stronger cards or rare cards may be included. With the new cards, you can then keep improving your deck of cards. One card can change everything There are different, freely selectable/combinable game modes. Depending on the game mode or selected game mode combination, it can therefore also happen that one single card changes the entire duel.
